left_column.explain_part_1: A <1>Steamder</1> is a room where you invite other players (or they join by themselves). Your multiplayer games are pooled together, and once the game starts, all games are presented to you.
left_column.explain_part_2: It's up to you to like or dislike the various games that come up. The first game liked by all players will be selected for everyone, ending the debate once and for all! <1>Debate settled!</1>

form.name: Steamder Name
form.label: Private Steamder
form.tooltip: If you check this box, your Steamder will not be visible to other players and can only be joined via an invitation link.

right_column.heading: Public Steamders
right_column.subtitle: Here you'll find <1>Steamders</1> open to everyone. The perfect way to make new friends! But remember, <2>you can only be in one <1>Steamder</1> at a time!</2> Let's not overdo a good thing...

table.tooltip: You can only be in one Steamder at a time! Leave your current Steamder to join another.
table.empty: No public Steamders are available right now. Create one!
